name: wonder-skin

effect.scarlet-violet: Non-damaging moves have exactly 50% base accuracy against this Pokémon.
effect.the-teal-mask: Non-damaging moves have exactly 50% base accuracy against this Pokémon.
effect.the-indigo-disk: Non-damaging moves have exactly 50% base accuracy against this Pokémon.

short_effect: Lowers incoming non-damaging moves' base accuracy to exactly 50%.

flavor_text.scarlet-violet: Makes status moves more likely to miss the Pokémon.
